title: Failed to run `x`

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

body:
Today, I attempted to synchronize the warehouse and run `./x`. But I got a lot of loop printing errors.  
Even if we start all over again, it won't help:

```
PS E:\code\rrr\rust> python --version
Python 3.7.8
```

OS: Windows11

<details open>

```
PS E:\code\rrr> git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/rust-lang/rust.git
Cloning into 'rust'...
```
